mapper.select: select name, type, value, mana_cost as manaCost, rage_cost as rageCost from moves where name = #{name}

select m.name, m.type, m.value, m.mana_cost as manaCost, m.rage_cost as rageCost from moves m inner join move_sets ms on m.id = ms.move_id inner join characters c on ms.character_id = c.id where c.name = #{name}
